verses.name: Revelation 19:1
verses.text: And after these things I heard a great voice of much people in heaven, saying, Alleluia; Salvation, and glory, and honour, and power, unto the Lord our God:

verses.name: Revelation 19:2
verses.text: For true and righteous are his judgments: for he hath judged the great whore, which did corrupt the earth with her fornication, and hath avenged the blood of his servants at her hand.

verses.name: Revelation 19:3
verses.text: And again they said, Alleluia. And her smoke rose up for ever and ever.

verses.name: Revelation 19:4
verses.text: And the four and twenty elders and the four beasts fell down and worshipped God that sat on the throne, saying, Amen; Alleluia.
